body.p: The Gentoo/AMD64 LiveCD images are available from Official Gentoo Mirrors. Since the AMD64 platform is still in the experimental stages, you can find the /experimental/AMD64/ directory of those mirrors. The latest available stage and LiveCD downloads are currently:

There are three ISO's available-- mini, cd1 and cd2:
mini is a bootable LiveCD only. Stage tarballs are not included.
cd1 is a bootable LiveCD with the stage tarballs included.
cd2 contains the GRP binaries for ebuilds like GNOME, KDE, OpenOffice, etc.
